title: Speedtest by Ookla - The Global Broadband Speed Test

embed.description: Test your Internet connection bandwidth to locations around the world with this interactive broadband speed test from Ookla

body: please how can i fix this problem .. i had{{champion:238}}  2 days ago can't play league of legends

replies.body: Is this rather lower than what your normal speeds look like? You should be able to get a better connection if you switch to an ethernet cord or patch up some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
